content.rendered:
Avan Yu was the first-prize winner of the Second Canadian Piano Competition in 2004. Since then, he has appeared as soloist with Rafael Fruehbeck de Burgos and the Dresden Philharmonic, Pinchas Zukerman and the National Arts Centre Orchestra, Bramwell Tovey and the Vancouver Symphony, the Sydney Symphony Orchestra, Morroco Philharmonic, Real Filharmonica de Galicia, Slovak Radio Orchestra, Victoria Symphony, Windsor Symphony and Nova Scotia Symphony Orchestra.

Avan was the winner of the 2012 Sydney International Piano Competion and is currently pursuing a graduate degree in piano performance with Klaus Hellwig at the Berlin University of the Arts.

Check out an interview with Avan by watching the video below:
